loginPageDescription: Your AI-powered farming assistant. Sign in or create an account.
displayNameHelper: Shown publicly. Required for sign up.
accountCreatedToastDescription: Welcome! Your account has been successfully created.
displayNameRequiredToast: Display name is required for sign up.
geolocationNotSupportedToastDescription: Your browser does not support geolocation, or it is disabled.
fetchingWeatherForCurrentLocationToast: Fetching weather for your current location.
invalidLatLonToastDescription: Please enter valid latitude (-90 to 90) and longitude (-180 to 180).
noWeatherData: No weather data available for this location.
pestAlertsWidgetDescription: AI-generated pest alerts based on your location.
noSpecificPestAlertsDescription: Currently, no specific high-risk pest alerts for your area. See general advice below.
noPestAlertData: No pest alert data available for this location.
fetchingPestAlertsForLocationToast: Fetching pest alerts for Lat: {{lat}}, Lon: {{lon}}.
marketTrendsWidgetDescription: AI-powered insights into crop market dynamics.
noSpecificCropTrendsAvailableDescription: The AI could not identify specific crop trends for this precise location, or it's not suitable for agriculture. See general summary if available.
noMarketTrendData: No market trend data available for this location.
marketTrendsFooterDisclaimer: Market data is AI-generated, simulated, and for informational purposes only. Not financial advice.
fetchedMarketInsightsForLocationToast: Fetched market insights for Lat: {{lat}}, Lon: {{lon}}.
aiCropAdvisorCardDescription: Get AI-powered crop recommendations based on your farm data.
regionCoordinatesPlaceholder: e.g., Central Valley or Lat: 34.05, Lon: -118.24 (auto-filled)
cropHistoryPlaceholder: Describe the crops grown on your farm in recent years
currentWeatherSummaryPlaceholder: e.g., Sunny, 25°C, Low humidity (auto-filled from Weather Widget)
currentMarketDataSummaryPlaceholder: e.g., Stable corn prices, increasing demand for soy (auto-filled from Market Trends)
feedbackPlaceholder: Provide feedback on the AI recommendations (optional)
profileHistoryDescription: Review your past AI crop recommendations and inputs.
errorLoadingHistoryDetails: Could not retrieve your history at this time:
profileNotSignedIn: Please sign in to view your profile and history.
saveFailedToastDescription: Could not save AI recommendations and feedback.
